profile.name: Mehdi Bentaleb
profile.bio: Expert en développement Laravel & PHP basé à Tanger. Je construis des applications web sur mesure, robustes et optimisées pour les entreprises au Maroc.

experience.description: Designed and developed an internal School Management System for Miage Tangier to automate student administration and internship tracking.
metrics: Built a comprehensive student management module to track academic records and attendance.
Developed a dedicated portal to manage partner companies and monitor student internship visits.
Implemented a secure role-based access control (RBAC) for administration, teachers, and staff.

experience.description: Accompagnement des entreprises à Tanger dans leur transformation digitale via des solutions Web robustes sous Laravel.
metrics: Développement de plateformes E-commerce avec gestion de stock dynamique.
Optimisation du SEO local pour des entreprises basées au Maroc.
Intégration de solutions de paiement et d'administration personnalisées.

education.description: Deep dive into Backend architecture, MVC patterns, and Database optimization.
Advanced training in modern web frameworks and collaborative coding environments.

projects.title: Market Store Management
projects.description: A robust Retail Inventory Management System built with Laravel. It helps local businesses in Tangier automate sales tracking, manage stock levels in real-time, and generate financial reports. Designed to streamline operations for Moroccan SMEs.

projects.title: Drive-Rent Management System
projects.description: Advanced Car Rental Management Software developed with Laravel and MySQL. Features automated booking workflows, real-time fleet availability tracking, and a secure reservation portal. Tailored for car rental agencies in Morocco looking for digital transformation.

projects.title: GymFitness Frontend
projects.description: A high-performance Responsive Landing Page for fitness centers. Built with modern CSS (Flexbox/Grid) and optimized for Core Web Vitals. Includes dynamic features like a BMI calculator, focusing on fast loading speeds and conversion-driven UI for local gyms.

commands.about: Full-Stack Web Developer aiming to build robust ecosystem-driven applications. Experienced with Laravel, and Modern UI/UX.
commands.skills: Core: Laravel, PHP, MySQL, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS. Tools: Git, VS Code, Composer.
